Create X 1/1 red Mercenary creature tokens with “{T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.” They gain haste until end of turn.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards.
Hexproof

Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library with a contraband counter.
[+1]: Up to one target creature gains menace and haste until end of turn.
[-X]: Charim deals X damage to any target and you gain X life. X cannot be 0.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “You may cast cards in exile with contraband counters on them and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast them.”

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance, reach, trample, haste
When D'Emil enters, create two 1/1 colorless Drone artifact creature tokens with flying.
At the beginning of your end step, if an attacking creature died this turn, draw a card and put two +1/+1 counters on D'Emil.
Creatures you control dying causes their triggered abilities to trigger as though they had entered.

Redbay suggestion:

Whenever a creature you control dies, you may return it to the battlefield, then exile it.

cards.rules_text:
Flash
You may have this creature enter as a copy of any artifact or creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact creature in addition to its other types, it has flying, and it's X/X where X is the mana value of the copied permanent.
You may cast cards in exile with contraband counters on them and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast them.
